name: easy-drive-car-rental
description: Easy Drive is a responsive car rental site built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a landing page with car deals, a search form, secure sign-in/sign-up with real-time validation, password strength checks, toggle visibility, and smooth interactive animations.
